doc:
Gloria Hendry https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gloria_Hendry 0 Gloria Hendry (born March 3, 1949), also known inaccurately as Gloria Henry, is an American actress and former Playboy model. She is best known for her roles in films from the 1970s, most notably: portraying Rosie Carver in 1973's James Bond film Live and Let Die, which was Roger Moore's first Bond film; and Helen Bradley in the blaxploitation film Black Caesar, and the sequel, Hell Up in Harlem. Gloria_Hendry ( born March_3_,_1949 ) , also known inaccurately as Gloria_Henry , is an_American_actress and former_Playboy_model . She is_best_known for her_roles in films from the_1970s , most_notably : portraying Rosie_Carver in 1973 's_James_Bond_film Live_and_Let_Die , which was Roger_Moore 's_first_Bond_film ; and Helen_Bradley in the_blaxploitation_film Black_Caesar , and the_sequel , Hell Up in Harlem .
